results.title: Mrs Harding teaches resourcefully (TEFC)

results.brief_description: Focuses on the value of resources as teaching aids. It is essential that they be properly stored, preferably centrally, recorded and in good working condition for maximum use.

results.title: Cosi
results.creator_credit: Mark Joffe, Richard Brennan, Timothy White, Meridian Films and Smiley Film
results.brief_description: Lewis (Ben Mendelsohn) is a uni drop-out who takes a last-ditch job in an asylum working with patients who are interested in the dramatic arts. He thinks his work will involve staging a small variety show with the group, until long-term patient, Roy, insists that the production be nothing less than a grand staging of Mozart’s opera Cosi Fan Tutte. It’s an ambitious thought to say the least. After all, none of the patients can speak Italian nor sing and the cast is made up of aging nymphomaniacs, obsessives and pyromaniacs who really have other things on their minds. Funny, warm and wonderfully mad, this is one production that’s definitely all there, even if the cast isn’t.

results.title: Immortal beloved
results.creator_credit: Bernard Rose, Bruce Davey and ICON
results.brief_description: When a cryptic letter from musical genius, Beethoven, turned up shortly after his death, it started one of history’s most compelling romantic mysteries. An enduring riddle that remains unsolved to this day. Who, among the scores of women that Beethoven seduced, was his “Immortal Beloved”? Gary Oldman and Isabella Rossellini share a love as hypnotic as the music Beethoven created, in this enthralling film based on the celebrated life of one of the greatest composers that ever lived.

results.title: Show business
results.creator_credit: Edwin Marin, Eddie Cantor and RKO Radio Pictures
results.brief_description: Show business follows the fortunes of a small group of stage folk from 1914 to 1929 and is based on incidents from Eddie Cantor’s life. Features scenes from a variety of performers including minstrel shows, vaudeville, Grand Opera and Ziegfeld Follies. Songs include “You may not remenber me”, “It had to be you” and “Whoopee” Cast includes Eddie Cantor, Joan Davis, George Murphy and Constance Moore. Story by Bert Granet.

results.title: Death in a French garden = Peril en la demeure
results.creator_credit: Michel DeVille, Emmanuel Schlumberger and Gasmont-EleFilm-T F 1 Film Productions
results.brief_description: One day a man walks into a house where his innocence, his youth and his life are at stake. Within the house is an exceedingly beautiful young girl and her mysterious, alluring and dangerous mother. A powerful husband. A hired killer. A threatening atmosphere where nothing is as it seems. Sex and power; possession and manipulation; desire and despair; death in a French garden. In French with English subtitles.

results.title: The Railway station = La Stazione
results.brief_description: Flavia, a rich and beautiful young society woman flees from an outlandish party, when she discovers her presence there served only to secure a business deal for her violent over-bearing lover Danilo. Attempting to leave her predicament on the first available train, Flavia seeks refuge in a small railway station where she meets Domenico, a shy and modest station-master who offers her both moral support and shelter from the impending storm. While spending the night together awaiting the arrival of the morning train, the pair become hopelessly drawn to each other despite their apparent class differences. In Italian language with English subtitles.

results.title: Miracle at sea : the Tony Bullimore rescue
results.creator_credit: Guy Norris, Richard Dennison, John Gau Productions and Orana Films
results.brief_description: The Southern Ocean is the harshest place on earth. It is the Everest of the oceans and, for centuries, it has been the mariner’s ultimate challenge. This documentary reveals Tony Bullimore’s struggle to cling to life in the darkness of the freezing hull of his capsized 60ft yacht, Exide Challenger. He was two months into the Vendee Globe Around the World Yacht Race, 1300 miles south of Australia when disaster struck and his yacht overturned in 60ft waves. So began the biggest air sea rescue in the history of the Royal Australian Air Force. It would involve four aircraft, six air crew and one hundred and ninety hours of flying.

results.title: The Wizard of Oz [1922]
results.brief_description: The classic story of Dorothy who is swept away to the magical land of Oz with her uncle and a couple of hired hands by a cyclone on her 18th birthday. Here they meet weird and wonderful characters and enjoy the adventure of a lifetime. This classic children’s story by L. Frank Baum was adapted for this early silent feature film by the author’s son, five years after his father’s death, along with top Hollywood comedian Larry Semon. Unlike the famous Judy Garland version of the story, there are no witches in Semon’s film, and the Scarecrow, Tin Woodsman and Cowardly Lion are only disguises for other characters to don.

results.title: Julius Caesar [Excerpts]
results.brief_description: So that people who have had no opportunity of seeing Shakespeare’s plays staged may see leading English actors in a full-scale stage production, these excerpts from “Julius Caesar” have been filmed, sponsored by the British Council. The cast includes Leo Genn as Marc Antony; Felix Aylmer as Brutus; and John Slater, Emrys Jones, Frederick Cooper, Ben Williams, Grqace Allardyce, Arthur Hambling and Sydney Monckton among the other players.
